comments:
Eclipse 3.2.2
Windows XP

I see an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException from time to time with the tracing turned on.  It seems Device#new_Object is not thread safe.

Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 29057
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.new_Object(Device.java:753)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC.<init>(GC.java:138)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC.<init>(GC.java:99)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog.shortenText(Dialog.java:392)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.progress.ProgressInfoItem.updateText(ProgressInfoItem.java:772)
Yup, tracing isn't thread safe.  Sigh.
